meanings.definition: A ring-shaped coral reef or island formed by the accumulation of coral debris and sand around a central lagoon.
meanings.sent1: The atoll in the ocean was a beautiful circle of coral and sand.
meanings.sent2: Tourists enjoyed snorkeling in the clear waters of the atoll.
meanings.sent3: The fish at the atoll held a meeting to discuss their favorite coral.
meanings.sent4: Her mind was like an atoll, surrounded by memories and thoughts.
meanings.sent5: The atoll shimmered under the tropical sun, inviting exploration.

meanings.definition: A group of islets or islands surrounding a lagoon.
meanings.sent1: The atoll was a collection of small islands huddled around the lagoon.
meanings.sent2: Birds nested on the atoll, enjoying the peaceful surroundings.
meanings.sent3: The atoll party was a hit, with each island offering a different snack.
meanings.sent4: Their friendship was like an atoll, with each person a unique island.
meanings.sent5: The atoll looked like a necklace of green gems floating in the sea.
